data.text: However, those in Judah who have been distressed/worried will not continue to suffer. Previously, Yahweh humbled the people in the land where the tribes of Zebulun and Naphtali live. But in the future he will honor the people who live in that Galilee region, along the road between the Jordan River and the Mediterranean Sea, where many foreigners live.
Some day, it will be as though [MET] the people who walked in darkness will see a great light.
Yahweh, you will cause us people in Israel to rejoice;
You will cause us to no longer be slaves [MET] of those who captured us;
The boots that the enemy soldiers have worn
Another reason that we will rejoice is that a special child will be born for us;
His rule, and the peace that he brings/causes, will never end.
The Lord has warned the people of Israel, the descendants of Jacob;
And all the people in Samaria and other places in Israel know that,
But Yahweh brought the armies of Assyria, the enemies of King Rezin of Syria, to fight against Israel
The army of Syria came from the east,
But even though Yahweh punished his people like that,
Therefore, in one day Yahweh will get rid of those who are like Israelâ€™s head and those who are like its tail;
The leaders [DOU] of Israel are the head,
The leaders of the people have misled them;
For that reason, Yahweh is not pleased with the young men of Israel,
When people do wicked things,
It is as though the whole land is burned black
Israeli people will attack their neighbors on the right to get food from them,
People of the tribes of Manasseh and Ephraim will attack each other,
